attributes.action: Action must be taken against M.P s who have made fraudulent claims  should face criminal charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sack those members of Parliament who have behaved in a devious and criminal manner. It should be immediate. They are not fit to represent anyone.  They  should face criminal charges of fraud whether they worked within the rules of government or not. They may play by their rules - it is still  fraud. Just like single mums who claim benefits and  have a partner sharing the home.They are stealing from the tax payers. Mums face jail and so should they.They should also pay money back from their ill-gotten gains.It is theft.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
